Title: Planet 51
Director: Jorge Blanco, Javier Abad(co-director), Marcos Martínez(co-director)
Writer: Joe Stillman (script by), Javier Abad (original idea by), Jorge Blanco (original idea by), Marcos Martínez (original idea by), Ignacio Pérez Dolset (original idea by)
Actors: Dwayne Johnson, Jessica Biel, Justin Long, Gary Oldman
Plot: An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.
